title: Vegan Leather Glossy Trench Coat - Brown
sizeDetails: Measurements are taken flat (in cm). Please note that a 1–3 cm difference may occur depending on the measuring method and person.
description: A modern reimagining of the classic trench, this glossy vegan leather coat is designed to bring effortless edge to any look. Its sleek, elongated silhouette and subtle shine make it a statement outerwear piece for both day and evening styling. Structured yet flexible, it captures a refined balance of sharp tailoring and contemporary ease. Made in Korea.

title: Bralette-Layered Stripe Shirt
sizeDetails: Size: Oversized fit - Works well EU 36-42
Measurements are taken flat (in cm). Please note that a 1–3 cm difference may occur depending on the measuring method and person.
description: A statement piece from Korean designer label Londonflat, this stripe shirt redefines layering with its built-in bralette detail. The sharp vertical stripes and structured silhouette balance modern tailoring with playful edge, making it versatile enough to wear on its own or styled under outerwear. Designed to stand out while maintaining everyday wearability, it’s a refined yet bold addition to your wardrobe.
care: Do not bleach, soak or rub
Turn inside out and wash with similar colors
